#summary How to install the COMMANDO engine.

_Note:_ This page is expected to be updated frequently, so check back often to see if any of the installation requirements or steps have been altered if you are having any difficulties.

= Prerequisites =

  * At least Windows XP with Service Pack 2
  * A video card that supports at least Shader Model 1.1
  * The .NET framework, which can be found here http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/netframework/cc378097.aspx
  * The XNA redistributable at least version 3.0, which can be found here http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyId=6521D889-5414-49B8-AB32-E3FFF05A4C50&displaylang=en

= The COMMANDO engine =

  * Download COMMANDOreleasev0.1.zip from here http://code.google.com/p/commando-engine/downloads/list. Unzip it and run the .exe file to run the engine. _Note 2:_ If you would like to compile the source code, then you will need Microsoft Visual Studio 2008 and XNA Game Studio 3.0, which can be found here http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyId=7D70D6ED-1EDD-4852-9883-9A33C0AD8FEE&displaylang=en
